name: Stuck On A Blua Rock
description:
My first game.

Your an Astronaut, stuck on a blua asteroid. You have to collect 5 fule-tanks to start your spaceship.

I made the Textures and the 3D Models myself. Thanks to Brackeys for a very good introduction ito Unity ( https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA)
